channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: The story of Dancer and Choreographer Taiaroa Royal takes us deeper into his world, his connection with the land and how that informs his creative vision. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Something For The People
channel.desc: A weekly Live Breakfast and late-night M?ori satire show, that combines Whakaata M?ori Te Ao News, Arataua's Haka Yarns, and Code (for the old people) all into one. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M? Te Atea
channel.desc: A lament to the many taiohi who have responded to the call of Hine-nui-i-te-p?. Te Wairere Ngaia and her ?konga explain the lessons learnt during a challenging period of loss for their kura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Uka
channel.desc: The best Euchre players from Tainui battle it out for the title of Uka champions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Bic Runga shines light on her shadowed past of racial struggles, speaking for the first time about a defining moment when she felt the country had turned on her. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waiata Anthems
channel.desc: Katchafire's Logan Bell deals with familiar challenges many M?ori face in reclaiming their language. He must confront his fears and the hurt caused by the loss of language. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: Haida band Jason Camp & The Posers reveal how even the most serene locales - their beautiful home island of Haida Gwaii - and their cultural stories inspire their unique brand of punk music. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Hinewehi Mohi discusses her impactful musical journey. (R).

channel.title: ?paki

channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)

channel.title: Only In Aotearoa

channel.title: Don't Even

channel.title: Kair?kau

channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara
channel.desc: While living a very busy professional and cultural life, Te Amohaere shows the hua of a wh?nau reo M?ori in an everyday setting. (R).

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: The Makiha Homestead has long been vacant. In light of covid-19 and the housing crisis, wh?nau longed to return home. This sparked their desire to rebuild their homestead and develop a papak?inga on their whenua. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Easy Eats 2
channel.desc: Join Hera Te Kurapa as she cooks up delicious, restaurant quality dishes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Master carver James Rickard takes us deeper into his gift, the people and life experiences that shaped him revealing the man behind the craft and one of our most prestigious carvers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The First Inventors
channel.desc: How First Nations people built an extraordinarily connected society on this enormous and often inhospitable continent. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Day One Shorts 2024
channel.desc: A short documentary on bipolar disorder, Taurewarewa explores the highs and lows of tides and emotions in a sequence of insightful k?rero framed against a backdrop of Aotearoa?s turbulent ocean. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Millie Lies Low
channel.desc: PREMIERE: This comedy-drama follows Millie, a university student who, after missing her flight to New York, decides to stay in Wellington and post fake updates on social media to convince others she successfully took up an internship. The film delves into themes of identity, social media fakery, and the pressures of modern life.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.title: Kori Club

channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the origins of thermal energy and how it was brought from Hawaiki to Aotearoa. (R).

channel.title: Te N?tube

channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: NEW: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Toa Hunter Gatherer
channel.desc: Adventurer Owen Boynton presents a holistic view of gathering kai as he travels the country to meet like-minded kaitiaki and outdoor experts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: Tui heads to Gisborne today to catch up with Rozzi who has called about her horse Zana who has a rearing problem. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Principal Hare Rua catches up with Nore to teach him how to catch his first kingi, while Harry Clarke goes after a monster stag. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Feral
channel.desc: From wild hog hunting to silver carp fishing, adventure-loving culinary explorer Via Vang is ready to chase, kill, cook, and eat all the crazy creatures that have overstayed their welcome. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer, Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. This week's travels have brought Pete to the West Coast of the South Island, Franz Josef. (R).
